! Title: Filters for Linkedin Distractions
! Description: The uBlock Origin filter list that hides all distractions on Linkedin to make usage less addictive and more focused.
! Homepage: https://github.com/BevizLaszlo/UBlock-Filters-for-Social-Media
! License: MIT

www.linkedin.com##main>.feed-sort-toggle-dsa__wrapper
www.linkedin.com##main:has(.feed-sort-toggle-dsa__wrapper)>.relative

! Web
linkedin.com##div[data-testid="mainFeed"] > div:not(:first-child)
! Mobile
linkedin.com##main > section > ol.feed-container
